title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
content: Greetings Bitcointalk Members,We're pleased to present an exclusive contest from Flush.com. Wagering Requirement: Winners are required to wager the prize amount 2x prior to withdrawal.4. Winner Selection: Winners will be determined based on this- https://bitcoindata.science/giveaway-manager/5. How to Enter: Kindly post your Flush username as a response to this thread.6. Participation Limit: One entry per user to ensure a level playing field.This contest serves as an ideal opportunity to engage with Flush.com in a rewarding manner. If you haven't had the pleasure of joining our platform, we cordially invite you to do so. Engage, participate, and remember to always Raise Your Game.Best of luck to all participants.Join Flush Casino Now
